effects.display_string: Set: Incinerate critical strike chance increased by 20%. Conflagrate critical strike chance increased by 25%.
(4) Set: When Conflagrate critically strikes, your Fire damage is increased by 5% for 6 sec.
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a flurry of 7 Demonfire bolts at 100% effectiveness. Casting Summon Infernal always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Hitting a Jackpot! increases your Mastery by 2.0% and your spells gain maximum benefit from Mastery: Chaotic Energies for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,770 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 178 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You are one of the devout. Your spells and abilities have a chance of burning a nearby enemy for 298,256 Radiant damage and healing another devout ally for that amount.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Lamplighter

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
